top.title: Three dead after Russia launches 'massive' attack across Ukraine
top.summary: Several regions are without power after missile and drone strikes targeted several cities.

top.title: 'A miracle': Officer shot in head during Bondi attack home from hospital
top.summary: The Christmas homecoming of Jack Hibbert, who was shot in the head and shoulder, is a "miracle", his family say.

top.title: Trump says US will keep or sell oil seized from Venezuela
top.summary: The US president also says the US intends to keep the tankers it has intercepted off the coast of Venezuela.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

top.title: Amazon blocks 1,800 job applications from suspected North Korean agents
top.summary: The firm’s chief security officer said North Koreans tried to apply for remote working IT jobs using stolen or fake identities.

title.#text: Apple fined $116 million over app privacy prompts
Dometic makes a better portable water faucet
